snippet: Janet Elder and Lawrence Ingrassia were named deputy managing editors and Rebecca Corbett was promoted to assistant managing editor.
abstract: The New York Times names Janet Elder and Lawrence Ingrassia deputy managing editors; names Rebecca Corbett assistant managing editor.
lead_paragraph: Janet Elder and Lawrence Ingrassia were named deputy managing editors and Rebecca Corbett was promoted to assistant managing editor.

headline.main: Promotion of 3 Editors Is Announced at The Times
headline.print_headline: Promotion Of 3 Editors Is Announced At The Times
